Risale-yi hat
Hüsn-i hat risalesi
Hat risalesi
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Taczâde, Mehmed bin Taceddin.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Widener Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 9 lines per page, in black and red. First ten leaves framed within one golden line (ff. 1r-10v).
بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم حمد بي حد وثناى لا يعد اول خالق اللوح والقلمه كه كاف ونون ايله جمله كائنات وممكنات... :Incipit
اما ياء اوج كونه در برى مجموعه وبرى مرسله در مبسوطه دخي ديرلر وبري معكوسه در راجعه دخي ديرلر بونلركبي تمت 1012. :Colophon
According to the colophon (f. 26r), copy completed in 1012 AH [1603 or 4 AD] in the hand of Muṣṭafá al-Ḥanyawī (sawwadahu Muṣṭafá al-Ḥanyawī).
Ownership statement and seal signed Muṣṭafá ibn al-Ḥājj Aḥmad al-... (?), Rabīʻ al-Awwal [1]141 AH [October/November 1728 AD] on f. 1r.
MS Arab 9. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
